website_summaries.verdict: Super-cushioned shoes that last through long workdays but whose thin leather tends to scuff and warp easily.
pros: Very soft and comfortable to stand in all day with little to no breaking-in required
Stylish enough to wear in business casual, retail or medical-lab environments
cons: Suede uppers scuff easily, especially in black
Thinner leather than its cousin, the Clarks Wallabee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of classic Clarks but thought the Wallabee was a little too manly. The Padmora is a touch more feminine and they are so cute when worn in a fashion forward way. There's definitely a line where they can veer into "elderly orthotic" so I plan carefully. Skinny jeans and pants, joggers, rolled cargos, etc look cute and with no show socks. I'm normally an 8 in most shoes (Vans, Nike, Jeffrey Campbell, Seychelles) but got the 7.5 in these and they are perfect. I have a wide forefoot and narrow heel and have no issues with them being too narrow or coming off my heels.
customer_reviews.author: The Kruels

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: Dope, swag. I am inlove with those shoes, very sturdy. I will be rocking them today. Lovely causal shoes. I got them at a very good price. They fit perfect and comfortable. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Comfortable Shoes - run a little large
customer_reviews.text: I followed the advice of the rest of the reviewers and ordered a half size smaller than what I wear. I'm an 8 1/2 and I ordered an 8 which fit perfect. These do run a tad large, so I would definitely go with a 1/2 size down. Super comfortable and stylish to wear if you need to be on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Hovanec

customer_reviews.title: I work in a school and these shoes have been perfect for walking around a large high school all day
customer_reviews.text: A birthday present to myself. I have big wide feet (10 Wide). I work in a school and these shoes have been perfect for walking around a large high school all day. My 25 year old son gave a compliments on my new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, comfortable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because they are a little bit big but had I heeded the warnings in the other reviews, I would have ordered a half size smaller. So don't be dumb like me. Listen to the other reviewers and order a half size smaller. But other than that, the shoes are comfortable and quiet...which may not be a big deal to most people but working in a hospital setting, I hate sounding like a horse clip clopping down the hallways. Plus I can sneak up on people easier. :-)
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't so sure about these shoes, but then when I put them on with the right pants, they look really cute. I wear a size 11, and they don't make my feet look too huge.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very well made and the length was perfect as well as the fit for the rest of my foot except the heel . I ordered 1/2 smaller than what I normally wear because I know they will stretch as real leather does. The problem was the width of the heel. It was so loose fitting that it literally flopped up and down on my foot. I know that ordering a narrow would not have worked for me. I have very skinny feet but always wear a normal M size in all other shoes. I was disappointed, but ordered a pair of the Janey Mae's which I know will be fine and are very very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B Watts

customer_reviews.title: When you read that these run big,  they're not kidding...
customer_reviews.text: I admired the wallabee shoe from Clarks on a friend, but I'm super cheap. So when I found these, I ordered them instead. The Amazon fit finder thing said I should go with my usual size, so against my better judgment and the advice of many reviews i ordered a 7. They were way too big for me. So I returned them end ordered a 6.5 ( couldn't exchange because the sizes had different prices which is beyond dumb, but I digress). The 6.5 was also too big. I was able to exchange that pair for a 6. Finally they fit. With all this trouble, these shoes better be some crazy comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harris

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love. These. Shoes. If they came in 20 different colors I would buy them. They're decently priced for Clark's. I wear these for work in a business casual environment. Super comfortable, give me a little bit of height, and I can wear them for 12+ hours. Also, they're very cute. They do run big so size a half size down your normal size. I have wide feet and wear a 7 1/2. I got a pair of 7's and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these a week ago and they have become my favorite shoes! They are so comfortable - no break in required at all. The light suede color is a beautiful neutral hue that can be worn in all seasons. I'm normally a 6.5 and went down to a 6. They fit perfectly a length-wise and are just a tad loose around the heel, but actually makes it more comfortable to walk long distances because the back doesn't rub against the heel.
customer_reviews.author: zyang

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear as a statement because they really aren't a current popular style. I get tons of compliments on them! They are extremely comfortable and super cute! I can see myself wearing these with anything from ankle jeans to summer dresses! Definitely order about a half size smaller than you usually wear. I wear between 8.5 and 9 but usually 9. I got an 8.5 in these shoes and probably could have worn an 8 but that's a close call. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not usual Clarks sizing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a comfortable shoe, but the sizing is a bit off. I usually wear a 9.5. Sometimes, I need a wide but not with Clarks. The 9.5 Padmora was huge. Sized down to 9 and the length is right but the width is a bit tight. Compared the two sizes side by side and was surprised but how much narrower the 9 was - seemed more than typical width difference for a half-size.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer2010

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and classic
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8, but based on the reviews, I also ordered a 7.5 for comparison. Out of the box, the size 8 was too big and slipped off my feet. The 7.5 was uncomfortably snug at first, esp around the sides, but the stiff leather started to break in after 10-15 minutes of walking around the house. Unfortunately, the heels loosened too much and began to gape. I’ve ordered a 7 in the hopes the space around the heels won’t be as obvious. Otherwise, the shoes are extremely comfortable as the sole gives a nice bounce with each step.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice-looking shoe, but had to return for heels slipping.
customer_reviews.text: Clarks are great, but the heels seem to be a problem fit-wise. These shoes were comfortable and fit right out of the box until I began to walk in them, when the heels slipped a lot, despite the laces being tied as tightly as possible. I guess the style is just wrong for me, which is very disappointing, since I like them so much. The shoes are attractive and if it weren't for the heel slip I would have definitely kept them.
customer_reviews.author: J Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: I wish It worked but...
customer_reviews.text: Description says suede, thought it would be like my Clarks Wallabee, but the upper is hard and the the heel is too loose no matter how I tighten the laces. Ordered 8.5, I am normally 8.5 and its perfect in sizing except that the shoe comes off on the heel when I walk. Sadly, I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: M. Buenaventura

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure if they are real
customer_reviews.text: Brought these six weeks before I worn them for the first day of class. Had Clark's before but not in a while. Look like the real thing but aren't wearing like the Clark's I know! The leather looks fake after three weeks and they are lined! Worst all is the sole and the top are coming apart and the bottom does not looks like soild crap soles. Dont buy this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Jacklin

customer_reviews.title: Funny, as they are the same as hushpuppies from ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. Funny, as they are the same as hushpuppies from the 70's but she says they are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Toe tightened
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fit really weird. It was right at the toe and really wide in the back almost to where it was sliding off my heel. I called my mom who has the same pair and she said hers where the same way but that is how they were made. They felt great on my feet as far as the sole. Very soft to wear. Once I wore them a few time they have felt better around the toe. Stretched some.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Griffin

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly comfy for someone on their feet often. They’re like a dream. Unfortunately I didn’t listen to other reviews and order a half size down so I had to return. Definitely would say order half a size down, I had s good bit of room and I also have wide feet. Other than that, love this shoe and the price was excellent compared to local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Butler

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and are comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These were the only shoes with good arch support that fit after I finished physical therapy for a broken ankle. I wanted a shoe that was both supportive and stylish for work and these fit the bill, especially since they did not hurt to wear. I'm a size 8 in women's shoes and they were true to size, even after the swelling in my ankle went down. The shoes did stretch a little after use, but they still fit great! I recommend getting suede protectant to keep these shoes looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: My new babies😍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are so cute and so comfortable. I typically wear size 8, sometimes 8.5 but I decided to order the 8 based on the reviews I read and I was right to do so. They are the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: D'averill

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what I wanted...The picture shows a rusty brown suede, but the shoe is actually a very dark brown leather. I was expecting the rusty brown, but really wanted a dark leather and that is what I got. This will be my 3rd pair of wallabees. I walk alot at work and on concrete and these shoes are about the only shoe that protect my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes based on the classic look after seeing them on a customer at retail store I work at. I bought a pair because I needed a shoe that I could stand on a concrete floor in for 8 hours a day.....these shoes are the best. My feet are not tire or sore, after a long day on my feet, taking shoes off my feet is usually the first thing I want to do. I actually DON'T want to take these shoes off ever........ I love wearing them barefoot, and usually with closed shoes (non sandals) that makes me crabby..
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes if fit is correct
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to fit...too large. Shoes were slightly scuffed and one shoe was missing the cardboard insert. I wondered if the shoes had already been worn and returned. The other pair I received was perfect. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: jbv

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The leather is very stiff and the entire shoe is longer and narrower than I usually experience with Clarks shoes. Ordering a different size would not have corrected this, so I am just returning them for a refund. The leather is more like what I associate with boating shoes -- stiff but waterproof. Otherwise seems to be well made,
customer_reviews.author: Celestial Lady

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked this style but couldn't find my size until now. The heel slips a bit, and the leather is stiffer than I'd prefer, but I'm hoping some thick socks and a little time will take care of both concerns. If so, this will become a 5-star purchase - especially since I got the shoes at such a good sale price. Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I Freaking Love These
customer_reviews.text: Clarks used to be an AMAZING brand but recently the sizing has been way off (not just on amazon but in stores as well). These shoes though are my new faves! I call them my ugly cuties because well they look really ugly not on feet and super cute on, like the perfect student shoe. They are extremely comfy and the 7 was a perfect 7.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these shoes twice and received compliments both times! The style and comfort are great! I read reviews across several sites, and although the consensus is that they run big, my feet are on the wider side so I stuck with my regular size 10 which worked out well.. No break-in period required.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie

customer_reviews.title: A joy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I love these Wallabees. Had a pair when growing up. Purchased as a adult, and they are comfy. I'm very pleased w this item, I'd definately repurchase wo a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: DogBreath101

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much that I got them in black ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this at the Clarks store in brown. Loved them so much that I got them in black and sand. They are incredibly comfortable. I described them to my friends as having Chris Hemsworth lovingly hugging my left foot and Idris Elba the left. I used them on a summer exchange that made me walk around 15k steps per day and sure my feet were tired but they were always comfortable and feeling loved. They are silent, sturdy, and look awesome with everything I’ve used them with. I would get them in all the colors of the rainbow if I could.
customer_reviews.author: WitchBaby

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great shoe! Tried these on at the Clark’s store, but found them a little cheaper on here. Totally worth it. As a teacher- I’m standing for so much of the day and my feet feel great! They have such a cute wedge. They go with so much. Especially love them for fall because they keep my feet so warm. Totally recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nash

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is a great style
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in that this shoe doesn't come in an wide or extra wide. I like this type of shoe, having a hard time finding a womens in wide or extra wide size 8 1/2. The size suggestion advised getting the 8 1/2 M but it is too small and tight. My toes were at the end of the shoe. I would say sizes run on the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Wheelman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a waste of money. I don’t like to return items so I will give them to GoodWill
customer_reviews.author: Carmen55

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable! I work in retail and need a comfortable shoe to last a long day on my feet. Normally, my foot is wide and I have difficulty finding shoes I can wear all day without pain. This fit the bill right away. I normally wear Sketchers and this is a great step up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanbedf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the shoe. And the comfort. But the sole could be wider . My foot hung over the sole some. Didnt feel right. But I like the shoe. But knew its uncomfortable for my foot. Clark make the sole wider.
customer_reviews.author: Cksgt2

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes and I found them in the shoe store for Higher price, tried them on in the shoe store and they fit perfect and bought the same exact ones here on Amazon for $25 less ! Can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: CKM

customer_reviews.title: No, these aren't orthopedics from the 70's and they aren't casual clogs
customer_reviews.text: I am a clarks wallabee expert and I would give these four and a half stars ... in my professional opinion. They got me at a good time because I felt generous and gave them 5 stars. They are pretty good shoes but the don't "wow" me... You know what I mean? My mom says clarks are, and I quote, " the most hideous shoes she has ever seen" "they look like 70's orthepedics" but life is about not listening to your mom... so I got them and she actually likes them more than my others. Pretty bittersweet but long story short, good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Pair of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these shoes for over a year but didn't want to pay $90 (mall price). Found them on Amazon and paid the majority of the cost with some gift cards over the holidays and boom...I have my new favorite pair of shoes. So cute with a denim dress...
customer_reviews.author: Vinde

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I needed a comfortable shoe for work since I walk a bit. I am a size 6.5-7, and I bought the 7; should have bought the 6.5 because they are a smidge big. I also have the brown leather one's and the only reason I did not give 5 stars is because they stretch a little though out the day and I have to tighten them up.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit right
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is stretched out where the ankle sits. If you have an extremely big ankle then this shoe will be fine for you. I put inserts in the shoe to make the width smaller and it did not help. I have normal size ankles, so this should have fit correctly. Also, I went to the Clarks store and they said that this shoe is the "old" brand that they do not carry anymore and has been discontinued. The seller does not tell you that.
customer_reviews.author: chelsey

customer_reviews.title: It fits true to size until...
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect until the leather stretches out a bit, and that doesn't take long. Then it feels a little big. If I could do it again, I'd buy a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jajjaaj

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I give this shoe a 5 star rating. I love the color and it is the most comfortable shoe I have ever purchased. My feet feel as though they are being massaged when I walk. The only thing is the heel of the shoe does fit a bit big(slips) but even this is menial compared to the overall satisfaction. Well worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth forever deciding if I actually liked these shoes before I bought them, but, after buying them, it turns out that I LOVE them! So comfy and even cuter!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: The pictures shows a suede like material. It came in leather. Which isn't a problem. I haven't worn them to work yet. The weather hasn't allowed for that. I did love the way they fit and the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Dina A. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: For me these are just a little above okay I gets lots of compliments but I think that’s Just because Jamaicans love Clarks they could fit a little nicer but okay overall
customer_reviews.author: Jacinth Bailey

customer_reviews.title: ... 9 and I ordered a 8 1/2 it is perfect. They are a little narrow so if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9 and I ordered a 8 1/2 it is perfect. They are a little narrow so if you have a super wide foot you may have to stretch them. These shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Meader

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend to tired, sore feet!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are well worth the price. As I've gotten older my feet are beginning to complain. I work in a school on concrete floors all day. These, I think, are a stylish altenative to sneakers, and much more attractive. The crepe sole is wonderful and I love the shape as well. I'm glad I found them (again). They are and oldie but a goodie. I have another pair in the walabee style shoe in a lighter shade. I hope I can find something for summer, too. You will not regret these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cweber

customer_reviews.title: Size 8.5-9, went with the 8.5 perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! They are perfect for those mildly cold days and those very cold ones. Fit as expected, I am a women size 8.5-9 in tennis shoes and chose the 8.5 in these. They are perfect and allow for room to stretch. Also, this is a great price compared to the Clarks website.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable. I read the reviews before purchasing about the shoes running big. This is true. I went down a 1/2 size the shoes are still are little big Around my foot but I don’t feel it’s cause to go down another size. The fit is comfortable. I love them. I wear them when i work at my retail store part time which requires a lot of time standing on my feet. Great purchase will probably purchase another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Brandie

customer_reviews.title: What I like the most is the cushioned soles
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is the cushioned soles. What I like the least is that they need to be tied rather than just slipped on. But then I like that they stay on my feet if I go outside onto uneven terrain. The laces seem longer than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Sent them back
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot, these were tight on me and were uncomfortable. Very disappointed in the shoes. Also I did not find them to be as "cushy" comfortable as other reviewers said. Not for me!
customer_reviews.author: T Bowen

customer_reviews.title: narrow and clunky
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair in the eighties so was confident to buy them online. Mistake. They have changed and I found them to be unwearable. The top stitching is thick and unwieldy, so the show is off balance and clunky. Returned with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: No insoles needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they had good reviews for people who are on their feet a lot. I wore them for a minimum of 8 hours, five days a week for about a year. They took a couple days to break in but they turned out to be awesome. I worked in a lab with no chairs or stools so I was always on my feet. After a year they were starting to show a little wear but what shoes dont. Overall I will buy them again when I need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Crape

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but tears quickly
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes, but the seams of the shoe are coming apart. It’s actually quite a bummer because the seams are busting and I dont wear them much maybe once a month and they are tearing apart.
customer_reviews.author: E.Artips

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Though these are not Clark’s Originals Wallabees (those you can only buy in their stores or on their website), these are extremely comfortable!. They do run a little big, but your wearing socks anyway so it’s fine. If you stand on your feet all day at work, these shoes are for you!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy about my wallabees
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I has to go down a size and it fits perfect, And normally wear a 7.5 but Ii ordered a size 7.. I love the color, design, texture. There were no torns or scratches. I can't wait to wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and comfy fall shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I got them a month ago and I haven’t stopped wearing them. They’re super comfy. I got the bright color ones and I was worried that the shoes will get dirty quickly, but so far they still look great. I did spray the shoes though, the moment I bought them, with stain and water repellent, so that may have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight shoe game
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit! The guys at work have a tight shoe game. I bought these to show them up for the ladies' side lol. They have some type of memory foam it's like walking on air. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: missbee75

customer_reviews.title: those are excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most about wearing these shoes is that they are very comfortable and as they are orthopedic they have helped me with my shrinkage problem of the tendons of my right leg.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nova

customer_reviews.title: Too big & heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the shoe was way too big. It was very heavy. It looks and fits nothing like Hush Puppy or Clarks. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: Generally Clark’s fit big so I ordered a half size smaller. This was a good call because they fit perfectly. The shoes are very comfy! I can easily wear them all day, day after day. The khaki color goes with nearly every outfit. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Pool

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes and so far have been wearing them without socks since they slide down. They fit a little loose without the socks but hopefully I can find a pair that will fit just right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, wonderful fit, fit as expected, comfy and durable. Little heavy but it is a great long-lasting quality shoe. I have wide feet and had to make sure I purchased this product in wide. Couldn't find a wide to try on anywhere local so I gave it a shot hoping that it would fit and it did.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide and large
customer_reviews.text: If you expect that these are great. If you’re purchasing for fashion order a size down. These run wide and large.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great except for two flaws
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. The design is beautiful; the construction is excellent and very sturdy. And it would be an extremely comfortable shoe except for two things - 1) it is quite a bit narrower than I would expect of a typical medium width 2) the back of the heel is cut low, allowing my heel to slip. I really wanted these to work for me, but that couldn't happen with those two issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amariedave

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: They fit great in my usual size, but they're a little too heavy and bulky for my taste. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: Product you may need to try on in person
customer_reviews.text: I sent mine back. They ran big and were very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Davis

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay
customer_reviews.text: They’re good but after a while once they’re well fitted they begin to look a little run down after while I’ve worn them possibly 15 times in the past 4 months looks like I’ve had them 15 years
customer_reviews.author: RaB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am INLOVE WITH MY SHOES. When I first saw them, I thought they were too small but they fitted perfectly which I VERY HAPPY ABOUT. They are VERRRRRRRY comfortable. I am super pleased
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these I looked at the reviews and most people said to go a half size down from your original size. I typically wear a size 8.5 and bought a size 8 and they fit perfectly! I love these shoes, they are so comfortable!! (The pictures are of the shoes after about two weeks of wearing them)
customer_reviews.author: Abagail Key

customer_reviews.title: Not quite wallabees but still a really nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: They arrived right on time and fit as expected. I generally wear 7 1/2 in shoes. They are comfortable and look really nice and were $20 less than store prices!
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Clarl
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are made with a high quality leather. The craftsmanship is beautiful. The arch support is perfect for me, and the Medium width is just right for comfort in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Ardene Bierwagen

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I measure a 6 C and wear 36 mainly in Dansko and have some 37s. The 6 was too tight if I wore a thicker sock. The 6 1/2 is great on the length. I wish it was wider- they do have some flexibility with the soft leather though. Cushy and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic style you will own forever
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoes with beautiful leather. Reserved my highest rating for the suede version which conforms better to the foot. Typical Clark's fit, but a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’m a fan of Clark’s shoes, I have several pairs and they are always top quality and fit. Can’t say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY FOR TEACHING
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes when I started teaching because my feet were killing me. It's made the world of difference. I wear them almost every day and have been for the past five months. I wore them on my trip to NYC where I was walking several miles a day and they did great. Highly recommend for anyone who is on their feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Eagle-Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Though they may be a little loose in the heels, order about half a size down in case! These shoes are very authentic and beyond comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: My favorites shoes now
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and so does Everyone that sees them. Loved the price too. Which is why it took me so long to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: judee borden

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime fan of Clark's shoes, and these Padmora Oxfords did not disappoint me. They are comfortable, attractive, easy to wear all day, and the fit is perfect. Best of all, no breaking in, comfortable right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: great uniform shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes these shoes. Clarks is the best company! I have always been happy with both their products, and exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer (Shupe)

customer_reviews.title: Nice show just a little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes...but they were a little too narrow for my comfort so I returned them. Otherwise they are a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wilhoit

customer_reviews.title: Don't get these
customer_reviews.text: They are so short in the back your foot pops out every time you walk. Poorly made
customer_reviews.author: meankid2

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable. I love to wear these to work during 8 hour or more shifts. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Winter Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Ok Nursey
customer_reviews.text: Only one problem the color sent to us wasn’t the color shown,got a dark brown instead but it was the right size and returning it would be stress so my sister made it dog
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Dee

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: definitely runs big, had to exchange for 1/2 size smaller. love the Wallabee and already had so many compliments and "omg where did you find those"
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not the most attractive shoes in the world but man do they feel nice on the feet. The cushioning can't be beat. I would say they are a little wider on my narrow feet than expected but overall great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They are very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are very comfortable and stylish. I did read the recommendation and got a half size smaller and they fit just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are extremely cute But, runs small. ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely cute But, runs small. Had to go up a half size, from a seven to seven and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Onemotherandonedaughter

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I work in these shoes. I stand all day. We are a team. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: 334DownSouthTrendBeauty

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy them again
customer_reviews.text: The upper heal (Part that holds my foot in the shoe) is so large my foot flopes in and out of the shoe (like a flip flop) If i wear short socks it rips the sock off my foot and it slings into my shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Der

customer_reviews.title: Size down a little
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I went down to a 7 (normally wear a 7.5) and they fit great! Super supportive and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: kellylaurel

customer_reviews.title: Order your regular size.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great quality and fit as expected. I ordered my usual size (which is 8) and they fit with little movement. The only area on my foot that the shoe doesn’t fit perfect is around my ankle. It is a little loose but after a few days of wearing the shoes I didn’t even notice it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size and no break in period at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna F.

customer_reviews.title: ... than you normally wear but they are the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I would order a half size smaller than you normally wear but they are the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: leslie tripp

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever!!! I wear them every opportunity I get. Super cute with boot leg jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J.

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide & leather is stiff
customer_reviews.text: Fits lengthwise, but the heel is too wide and slips off with every step. Leather is extremely stiff. We will be returning for their suede Wallaby instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: The color is so pretty, I always buy clark's and have never had a problem with them, it's really comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean girl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very comfortable with very little break in time. I have RA and they feel great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable shoes and seem very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tapsy

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this show and it works with any outfit. The show is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thicklin

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Padmora Oxford
product_meta.description: Crafted of either leather or suede, this women's lace-up shoe has a laidback attitude and a handsewn look and feel. fabric/synthetic linings and tpr outsoles with a slight wedge add comfort. choose this clarks collection shoe for days when you need the comfort of a sneaker, with a bit more style.
